title: Teen shot in Lawndale
content:
A 17-year-old boy was shot in the leg Wednesday afternoon in the West Side Lawndale neighborhood.
About 3:30 p.m., he was walking in the 600 block of South Karlov when a female walked up and opened fire, according to Chicago Police. He was taken to Mount Sinai Hospital in good condition.
Police said the shooting stemmed from a domestic dispute. No one was in custody.
